name: Watch Out (itch) (It´s Ukraine, not a game)
name_original: Watch Out (itch) (It´s Ukraine, not a game)
description:
Follow the daily routines of Ukrainian citizens and see how the war affects their lifestyles.

You will be able to witness how the city and its inhabitants change with the progress of the war.

How people flee the country, help their neighbors, and try to stay strong and optimistic during these times.

With the option of our interactable timeline, you will always be able to go back in time and focus on seeing and understanding the story of another person you haven't been watching before.

  • Isometric View of a normal Neighborhood in Ukraine
  • Throughout the game, you see how it transform
  • You can move around the neighborhood and see different events taking place.
  • Through a timeline, you can always go back to see how things used to be

Disclaimer: The game contains imagery that might be triggering. 

To play the game open the page on a PC.

Dala Klimek - Programming, Technical Art, Animation

Linavalo Hinyemata - 3D Art, Texturing

The game was made as part of the "It´s Ukraine, not a game" project. To explore more games on the topic of the Ukraine-Russia war, visit our website.
